sentences.english: From 1926 to 1929, the biggest flood in a century hit Suiyuan region.

sentences.english: Establishing Siouan Province contains important significance in strengthening the national defense and unifying the country.
sentences.chinese: 绥远建省对巩固国防和维护国家统一有重要意义。

old name for Hohhot city 呼和浩特[Hu1 he2 hao4 te4], Inner Mongolia

Uliastai, the Qing name for outer Mongolia
Peiping or Beiping (name of Beijing at different periods, esp. 1928-1949)
